summary: The implementation successfully delivers all four requirements (REQ-79, REQ-80, REQ-81, REQ-82). DaireGorunumu.tsx was created with responsive grid layout, occupancy status badges, hover interactions with tooltips, and Turkish date formatting. The component was integrated into OwnerDashboard.tsx as a new section. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Added occupant name display on apartment cards showing which user is assigned to occupied apartments
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-81 only specified showing occupancy status (Bo≈ü/Dolu) with badges/icons. Displaying the actual occupant name was not requested in any requirement

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented getOccupantName utility function to fetch and display user names on apartment cards
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not ask for displaying user names or user assignment information within apartment cards. This was explicitly listed in Non-goals: User assignment interface within the apartment cards
